actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from DOD, GSA, OMB.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend section 203 of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize the donation of surplus real or personal property for use in connection with a public harbor.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize the Administrator of General Services to assign to the Secretary of the Army for disposal certain surplus real or personal property for use in the development, improvement, or operation of a public harbor, including property needed to develop sources of revenue from nonmaritime businesses. Requires that the deed of conveyance of disposed property provide that the property shall be used for the purpose for which it was conveyed or revert, at the Secretary's option, to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 203 of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize the donation of surplus real or personal property for use in connection with a public harbor.
